channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Time to Push the Iranian Regime to Collapse Is Now
item.description: The world will be a safer place in the absence of that regime, but only the Iranian people can be the authors of their liberation.
